message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. What do you say?
I'll take the majority, you can have the rest
That's a pretty lopsided deal, Bob. I'm not interested in taking 20% of the remaining amount.
Meet me in the middle, Bob. This way we both get a decent share.
You're getting closer, but I'm not giving up yet
You're not giving up yet, huh? I'm not giving in either. I'll keep pushing for a better deal.
I'm willing to give you a slight edge, Bob. Let's make a deal.
You're getting desperate, I'm going to take advantage of that
You think I'm desperate? I'm just getting started. I'll not give up yet.
It's time to be fair, Bob. 50/50 split. No more games.
